description:
This is an incredible journey offering a variety of hidden object search modes and a wide selection of exciting mini-games.
Treat yourself to a unique journey through 30 amazing and unforgettable places. 
You will be able to visit azure beaches, to conquer deserts, to immerse yourself in the beauty of forests, and to enjoy holidays in a variety of places on our planet. 
The game will give you the opportunity to use your skills and knowledge to complete mini-games and find all the hidden objects.

The collector's edition includes: 
- 10 additional locations 
- 10 additional mini-games, as well as 12 puzzles for real fans 
- Souvenir shop
